title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 803.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 803.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the methods and
procedures governing the nature, availability and location of those records of
the New York State Office of Alcoholism and Substance Abuse Services which are
covered by the Freedom of Information Law (article 6 of the Public Officers

Law) and the rules of the New York State Committee on Public Access to Records
(21 NYCRR Part
1401
). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
803.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
